## arcLength variable

Returns the arc length / perimeter / circumference of the given shape. For groups calls `arcLength()` for each child and returns the sum of results.

Implemented for:

- Circle - Ellipse - Group - Line - Polygon - Polyline - Quad - Rect - Triangle

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
arcLength: import("@thi.ng/defmulti").MultiFn1<IShape, number>
```
